original: intros T U F G HF f g HF' Hf Hg. unfold filterlim in Hf, Hg. unfold filter_le in Hf, Hg. unfold filtermap in Hf. unfold filterlim in Hf, Hg. unfold filter_le in Hf, Hg. apply (filterlim_comp T U U F (fun x : U => True) G G). - auto. - apply (filtermap_filter T U f F HF). - apply (filtermap_filter T U g F HF).
